contentrichtext.text: '''John Pope''' is the name of: ==Politicians== *[[John Pope (fl.1384-1397)]], MP for [[Gloucester (UK Parliament constituency)]] *[[John Pope (fl.1419-1421)]], MP for [[Reigate (UK Parliament constituency)]] *[[John Pope (Kentucky)]] (1770–1845), U.S. politician, senator for Kentucky, and governor of Arkansas Territory *[[John Pope (alderman)]] (born c. 1972), Chicago alderman from the 10th ward *[[John Henry Pope]] (1824–1889), Canadian farmer, lumberman, railway entrepreneur, and politician ==Military== *[[John Pope (travel writer)]] (1749–1802), U.S. soldier, traveler, and author *[[John Pope (naval officer)]] (1798–1876), U.S. naval officer in the American Civil War *[[John Pope (military officer)]] (1822–1892), U.S. soldier and Union general in the Civil War ==Others== *[[John Pope (artist)]] (1821–1880), artist in Boston, Massachusetts, and New York in the 19th century *[[John Pope (fictional astronaut)]], fictional character in James A. Michener's 1985 novel ''Space'' *[[John Russell Pope]] (1874–1937), U.S. architect *John Pope, [[List of Falling Skies characters]] ==See also== * [[Pope John (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Pope, John}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pope, John}}
